name: linkmanager-saas
description: Professional SaaS platform for link management and analytics

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.railway:build: cd apps/backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../../apps/backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.db:setup: cd apps/backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push && npm run db:seed
scripts.status: echo "Frontend: http://localhost:3000" && echo "Backend: http://localhost:3001" && echo "API Docs: http://localhost:3001/api/docs"

author: LinkManager Team
